title: Other adhesions and disruptions of iris and ciliary body
chapter: Diseases of the eye and adnexa
block: Disorders of sclera, cornea, iris and ciliary body
category: Other disorders of iris and ciliary body
exclusion: certain conditions originating in the perinatal period
